summary: a Work in progress player Home that over looks the waterfall by Darkwater Cavern.
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Book Antiqua] [center] [size=15]Riverview Keep[/size] [/center][/FONT]

[img] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17667-1-1338005277.png [/img]

This Mod is a WIP to add a player home to the Darkwater Cavern area that will eventually have everything you need, storage Boxes for the collectors, weapon racks Merchants and your very own guards.  This is still in the Alpha State so please take a look and let me know your thoughts.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17667-4-1338005347.png[/IMG]
author: Version 1 Designs

files.name: Riverview Keep Alpha 05
files.changelogHtml:
The main area in the barracks is nearly completed
added 3 NPC\'s including a merchant
